strapiPost.title: Fare Flight Talks Through 2021 Travel Data
strapiPost.content:
The latest data from the Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) shows the cost of flying stayed about the same in 2021 as compared to 2020.

  • Staying low: Data shows that the average XNA passenger paid $362 for a roundtrip domestic flight in 2021, which is only $8 more than in 2020, and lower than what it had been for years. Before it started to decline in 2019, the average fare was over $500. 
  • Highs, tops: The lowest airfare last year was from Frontier Airlines where the average roundtrip fare was $80. The most expensive average fare last year was $450 roundtrip with Delta, which goes to places such as Atlanta and New York. Top destinations in 2021 were Denver, Dallas/Fort Worth, and Los Angeles.
